reviewRequestEmail.subject: Order #[order_number], how did it go?
reviewRequestEmail.body:
Hello [name], 
 
We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.

reviewReplyEmail.subject: In response to your review of [product]
reviewReplyEmail.body:
Hello [name],
 
A reply was added to your review of [product]:
[reply_content]
To respond privately, reply to this email.

dicountPhotoVideoReviewEmail.subject: Your discount code at [store]
dicountPhotoVideoReviewEmail.body:
Hello [name],

Thank you for sharing your experience!

Use the following discount code for [discount] off your next purchase at [store]

addReviewSameDiscountText: Your [discount] off discount is wait for you!
addReviewDifferentDiscountText: Upload a photo to get [photo_discount] off or a video to get [video_discount] off your next purchase!
